#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main(int argc, const char * argv[]) {
  int T;
  cin>>T;
  while (T--) {
    int N;
    cin>>N;
    
    int A[10002] = {0};
    int num;
    for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {
      cin>>num;
      A[num]++;
    }
    
    int maxNum = 0;
    int maxNumIndex = 0;
    for (int i=0; i<10002; i++) {
      if (A[i]>maxNum) {
        maxNum = A[i];
        maxNumIndex = i;
      }
    }
    cout<<maxNumIndex<<" "<<maxNum<<endl;
  }
  return 0;
}
